title: Making a Topsy-Turvy Workbench from a Log

media:group.media:title: Making a Topsy-Turvy Workbench from a Log
media:group.media:description:
This video continues the story of the accomplished projects and bushcraft activities during the last summer vacation spent at my log cabin camp. In the previous episode https://youtu.be/_RM5SD_FZ_0 , I've shown my on-site preparations which were necessary for beginning the main summer project of making a wooden waterwheel and a waterwheel-powered mill.
--------------------------------
Two Chainsaw Secrets | Turning a Tree into Perfect Boards: https://youtu.be/8qz64ELkxdA
--------------------------------
